name: Elven Roots
description:
A 2D side-scroller platformer game where you play as an femme fatale on the quest to investigate the dark runic arts. Join the adventure of the heroine to stop the evil roots that is terrorising the peace of the elven village.

Controls
A & D : To move
J : Root Spike Skill
K: Root Bullet Skill
I: Open Skill Tree

Elven Roots was developed by Team Skill Issue for Global Game Jam under 48 hours. The team consists of:

  • Eric Ng Boon Lee
    • Technical Designer/Artist
    • https://github.com/Xiel7

  • Gabriel Kwa PinYue
    • Programmer
    • https://github.com/GabrielKwa

  • Teoh Chun Wai
    • Programmer
    • https://github.com/S34NN99

  • Charlotte Lim Yi Lin
    • Artist
    • https://ereb-cor.itch.io/

Thank you for playing!
